hasMenuItem.name: Eeeeeeelll Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Prawn tempura, cucumber, avocado and crab meat inside, BBQ eel, avocado, masago, teriyaki sauce and mayo on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Rainbow Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Cucumber, avocado and crab meat inside, avocado, tuna, salmon, ebi, sockeye salmon, masago, teriyaki sauce and mayo on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Mango California Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Cucumber, avocado and crab meat inside, tuna, mango, masago, teriyaki sauce and mayo on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Hot Kamikaze Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Negitoro(chopped tuna belly with green onion), cucumber, masago, avocado, tempura bits inside, spicy sauce, teriyaki sauce and mayo on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Big Negitoro Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Negitoro(chopped tuna belly with green onion), cucumber, masago and tempura bits inside, shiso(Japanese herb), teriyaki sauce and mayo on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: BBC (Big BC) Roll
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ salmon, cucumber and shiitake mushroom inside, grated daikon radish, ikura(salmon roe), kaiware(radish sprouts), shiso(Japanese herb), dried bonito flakes and teriyaki sauce on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Yummy Yam Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Yam tempura, cucumber, avocado and tempura bits inside, avocado, shiso(Japanese herb) and teriyaki sauce on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Love Plum Uuuuumeeee Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Wrap with soy bean sheet, shiitake mushroom, cucumber and avocado inside, shiso(Japanese herb), umeboshi(salted plum) and sliced pickled radish on top. (10 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: #2  Udon Noodle Combo ◎
hasMenuItem.description: California roll 8 pieces, dynamite roll 8 pieces and half udon noodle with prawn tempura in soup.

hasMenuItem.name: #4  tofu set meal  ◎
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ Tofu 5pc, Rice, Seaweed with Miso Soup

hasMenuItem.name: #3  Saba set meal ◎
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ Saba ( Mackerel ), Rice, Seaweed with Miso Soup

hasMenuItem.name: #6  Dinner Box Combo ◎
hasMenuItem.description: California roll 8 pieces, dynamite roll 8 piece, half chicken teriyaki don, edamame, seaweed salad and miso soup.

hasMenuItem.name: #5  Black Cod Set Meal ◎
hasMenuItem.description: BBQ black cod (saikyou miso flavor), seaweed salad, 4pcs sashimi (tuna, salmon), miso soup, rice and takuan(pickled radish).

hasMenuItem.name: #1  Sashimi Set Meal  ◎
hasMenuItem.description: Chef's special sashimi 8 piece, seaweed salad, rice with miso soup (chef's special sashimi varies).

hasMenuItem.name: Negitoro Toro Aburi Oshi Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Flamed negitoro(chopped tuna belly with green onion) on pressed sushi rice, mayo, teriyaki sauce and alfalfa aprouts on top. (5 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Sockeye Salmon Aburi Oshi Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Flamed sockeye(wild) salmon on pressed sushi rice, grated daikon radish,  ikura(salmon roe), shiso(Japanese herb), mayo and teriyaki sauce on top. (5 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Saba Aburi Oshi sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Flamed saba(mackerel) on pressed sushi rice, grated ginger, green onion, alfalfa sprouts, mayo and teriyaki sauce on top. (5 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Avocado Aburi Oshi Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Flamed avocado on pressed sushi rice, shiso(Japanese herb), alfalfa sprouts and teriyaki sauce on top. (5 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Unagi Aburi Oshi Sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Flamed unagi(BBQ eel) on pressed sushi rice, tobiko(flying fish roe), alfalfa sprouts, mayo and teriyaki sauce on top. (5 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Salmon Abri Oshi sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Flamed Atlantic salmon on pressed sushi rice, grated daikon radish, ikura(salmon roe), shiso(Japanese herb),  mayo and teriyaki sauce on top. (5 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Scallop Aburi Oshi sushi
hasMenuItem.description: Flamed scallop(big hotate) on pressed sushi rice, tobiko(flying fish roe), mayo, teriyaki sauce and alfalfa sprouts on top. (5pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Roll Combo B
hasMenuItem.description: California roll 8 pieces, dynamite roll 8 pieces and BC (BBQ salmon)roll 8 pieces.

hasMenuItem.name: Roll Combo A
hasMenuItem.description: California roll 8 pieces, tuna roll 6 pieces and salmon roll 6 pieces.

hasMenuItem.name: Yam Tem Roll Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Yam tempura roll 6 pieces, cucumber roll 6 pieces and inari nigiri 1 piece.

hasMenuItem.name: Sushi Combo Regular
hasMenuItem.description: Tuna nigiri 1 piece, salmon nigiri 1 piece, ebi nigiri 1 piece, unagi(BBQ eel) nigiri 1 piece, egg nigiri 1 piece, tuna roll 6 pieces and salmon roll 6 pieces.

hasMenuItem.name: Sushi Combo Delux
hasMenuItem.description: Tuna nigiri 1 piece, salmon nigiri 1 piece, ebi nigiri 1 piece, BBQ eel nigiri 1 piece, egg nigiri 1 piece, sockeye salmon nigiri 1 piece, salmon roe nigiri 1 piece, tobiko nigiri 1 piece, tuna roll 6 pieces, salmon roll 6 pieces and UNI nigiri 1 piece. ( If  UNI SOLD OUT, it will be changed to Scallop)

hasMenuItem.name: Sushi Combo Toro
hasMenuItem.description: Tuna toro(belly) nigiri 1 piece, salmon toro(belly) nigiri 1 piece, hamachi(yellowtail) nigiri 1 piece, BBQ eel nigiri 1 piece, egg nigiri 1 piece, sockeye salmon nigiri 1 piece, tuna roll 6 pieces and salmon roll 6 pieces.

hasMenuItem.name: Veg Sushi Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Inari nigiri 1 piece, avocado nigiri 1 piece, kaiware nigiri 1 piece, shiitake mushroom nigiri 1 piece, tofu nigiri 1 piece, avocado roll 8 pieces and  cucumber roll 6 pieces.

hasMenuItem.name: Miso Soup ◎
hasMenuItem.description: (Veg base) No preservatives, no additives, all natural.

hasMenuItem.name: Tuna Tataki Salad ◎
hasMenuItem.description: Seaweed salad(organic green leaf, peppers, alfalfa, tomato and homemade non-oil ponzu dressing), garlic chips on top of tuna tataki (flamed tuna sashimi 5 pieces.)

hasMenuItem.name: Seaweed Salad ◎

hasMenuItem.description: Ground pork and vegetable steamed dumplings with garlic chips. (6 pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach Gomaae ◎
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Spinach with sesame sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Edamame ◎
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Lightly salted edamame.

hasMenuItem.name: Takoyaki  ◎
hasMenuItem.description: 5 pieces. Japanese snack in the shape of little round balls containing pieces of octopus with slightly salty takoyaki sauce, olive oil mayo and dried bonito flakes.

hasMenuItem.name: Takowasa
hasMenuItem.description: Chopped raw octopus and heavily  flavored with wasabi (Japanese horseradish).

hasMenuItem.name: Ankimo
hasMenuItem.description: Monkfish liver with homemade ponzu sauce (3pieces)

hasMenuItem.name: Hamachi Kama ◎
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled yellowtail cheek (Juiciest part of the fish)

review.reviewBody: The salmon and tuna rolls are the best I've had, so much good quality fish for a great price. None of those tiny rolls with a small bit of fish in it, they're regular sized. Hitoe is absolutely my go-to sushi place.
Consistently delicious! Very grateful they offer actually gluten free foods and have lots of variety. My fave is their Melty Salmon !
Definitely the best sushi in the area! Staff is friendly and food is always delicious. They also have lots of vegetarian and gluten-free options!

The rolls are good but way too small. They're about the size of a quarter.  I have found better GF sushi for the same price. 

The picture  doesn't depict just how small these rolls are.
